Class ParticleSwarmOptimization

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.computing.ai.swarm.ParticleSwarmOptimization
public class ParticleSwarmOptimization extends Object
Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) - nature-inspired global optimizer.

Swarm of particles exploring search space. Each particle: position, velocity, personal best, global best. Update: v = Ãâ€°v + cÃ¢â€šÂrand()(pbest - x) + cÃ¢â€šâ€šrand()(gbest - x)

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
